title: watch: VITRA design museum unlocks NIKE’s secret archives in latest exhibition
description: most of the exhibits are sourced from the department of NIKE archives (DNA), comprising more than 200,000 items. The post watch: VITRA design museum unlocks NIKE’s secret archives in latest exhibition appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
author: lea zeitoun I designboom
excerpt: most of the exhibits at VITRA are sourced from the department of NIKE archives (DNA), comprising more than 200,000 items.
text: installation view | Nike: Form Follows Motion, © Vitra Design Museum | image by Bernhard Strauss installation view | Nike: Form Follows Motion, © Vitra Design Museum | image by Bernhard Strauss installation view | Nike: Form Follows Motion, © Vitra Design Museum | image by Bernhard Strauss Sketch of Air Max, Tinker Hatfield, 1986, © NIKE, Inc.KEEP UP WITH OUR DAILY AND WEEKLY NEWSLETTERS PRODUCT LIBRARYa diverse digital database that acts as a valuable guide in gaining insight and information about a product directly from the manufacturer, and serves as a rich reference point in developing a project or scheme.
